name: Shoot Em' Down
description:
OH NO! Zombies and skeletons are chasing you, you have to defend yourself

Using guns you will shoot your way through zombies like a pro!

WASD to move, shoot with SPACE or just CLICK

E to switch guns and lastly, N to start next wave (also start at the beginning of game)

(There is currently only 10 waves and only an AK a pistol and a sniper rifle)
